Text: Just crap.....hindi audio breaks too many times in the whole video....dont download until its rectified

"amitabhbansal" is Absolutely right ! I thought he is a Spammer and Ignore him and Download this Crap, Its Audio is clear and It is Hindi as author said BUT "first 5 minutes of Audio" **Repeats in various part of the movie**, specially in the Interesting scenes !!!
Please dont ignore these comments as I did..
